Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.Network.ToModel

Class SocketClient

java.lang.Object
SoftEng_2024.Network.ToModel.SocketClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Remote, ClientInterface
public class SocketClient extends Object implements ClientInterface
SocketClient class implements the ClientInterface for communication with a server over sockets.
